p: While the lung is the principal and most crucial target of attention for those with severe COVID-19, the distribution of the ACE-2r is sufficiently wide that we are confronted with the controversy as to whether damage to the kidneys, GI tract, heart, skin, CNS, and PNS is a consequence of the reduced oxygen-carrying capacity of blood, secondary to the damage to the lung's gas exchange apparatus, or whether viral targeting of endothelium in other tissue beds can also foment the PANIC Attack, and the resultant injury mechanisms associated with such uncoordinated and poorly regulated immune activation.
